document.full_text: goldman sachs group inc  shares were down 3.2 percent on thursday afternoon after two analysts downgraded the stock and press reports questioned whether a senate investigation will threaten the bank's reputation.
document.title: goldman shares fall on analyst cuts, reports
lines_and_colors: goldman sachs group inc  shares were down 3.2 percent on thursday afternoon after two analysts downgraded the stock and press reports questioned whether a senate investigation will threaten the bank's reputation.
